ResponseRule.name: Rise and Shine
ResponseRule.description: Alex leaves a message for the player each day he wakes up in the apartment simulation.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Calls Plyr On Helicopter
ResponseRule.description: Alex calls teh player while he's riding in the helicopter on the way to Transtar

ResponseRule.name: Rise and Shine Alternate
ResponseRule.description: Alex calls the player each day he wakes up in the apartment simulation. This one is treated more as a live call than a voicemail

ResponseRule.name: LG Video Interrupted
ResponseRule.description: Alex interrupts Morgan's first video and deletes the file.

ResponseRule.name: LG Video Interrupted (MorganFemale)
ResponseRule.description: Alex interrupts Morgan's first video and deletes the file.

ResponseRule.name: Player Didn't Sit Tight In Office
ResponseRule.description: Alex Flavor Comment. Somewhere after office, but before Psychotronics.

ResponseRule.name: Player In Psychotronics
ResponseRule.description: Alex comments when the player first arrives in psychotronics.

ResponseRule.name: Calibrate Your Psychoscope
ResponseRule.description: Alex helps the player to use the psychoscope. This will allow the player to use new abilities as well as unlock the deeper labs in psychotronics.

ResponseRule.name: You Already Calibrated Your Psychoscope
ResponseRule.description: Alex helps the player to use the psychoscope. This will allow the player to use new abilities as well as unlock the deeper labs in psychotronics.

ResponseRule.name: Player Finished Calibrating Psychoscope
ResponseRule.description: Player finished calibrating their psychoscope. Alex rewards w/ some neurmods.

ResponseRule.name: Player Sees Kletka
ResponseRule.description: Alex comments when the player sees the kletka cylinde and the aliens inside it for the first time.

ResponseRule.name: Player Installed First Alien Neuromod
ResponseRule.description: Alex comments when the player installs their first alien Neuromod.

ResponseRule.name: Mirror Neurons
ResponseRule.description: Alex comments about empathy after the player finished either one of the exeriments.

ResponseRule.name: What is the Coral
ResponseRule.description: Alex comments about the coral research.

ResponseRule.name: Player Found Alex's Office Early
ResponseRule.description: Player climbed up to Alex's office in the Arboretum before the appointed time.

ResponseRule.name: You Trashed My Office
ResponseRule.description: Player broke / looted some things from Alex's office. Later, Alex calls to comment.

ResponseRule.name: I Trapped You In Deep Storage
ResponseRule.description: Alex trapped Morgan in Deep Storage.

ResponseRule.name: Reboot: What Did You Do?
ResponseRule.description: Alex freaking out a little that the whole station just went dark.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Invites Player To Office After Station Reboot
ResponseRule.description: After the player re-activates the elevators and airlocks, Alex relents and invites the player up to his office.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Gives Player Grav Lift Code
ResponseRule.description: After the player enters the Arboretum on Alex's invitation, Alex gives him the code to activate the grav lift.

ResponseRule.name: Player Reached Alex's Office After Power Plant
ResponseRule.description: Alex asked Morgan to meet him in his office in the Arboretum. Unfortunately, because of the arrival of Dahl, Alex had to scoot.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Asks Player to Scan Coral
ResponseRule.description: After the player watches the video in Alex's office, Alex tasks him with scanning several hot spots to finish the research needed for making the null wave transmitter a reality.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Forewarns About Dahl's Approach
ResponseRule.description: As the player is on his way to scan coral for Alex, Alex contacts to forewarn about Dahl and The Board of Directors taking action against them.

ResponseRule.name: Player scanned one coral node
ResponseRule.description: After the player scans one of the coral nodes, Alex chimes in

ResponseRule.name: Player scanned all coral nodes
ResponseRule.description: After the player finished scanning all the coral nodes, Alex radios in with encouragement and a bit of direction. Grows urgent as he spots something scary in the intial readings.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Asks Player to Upload Scan Data
ResponseRule.description: After the player scans all of the coral nodes and returns to the Arboretum, Alex tells him to come up and upload the data

ResponseRule.name: Alex notices Upload stalled
ResponseRule.description: After the player uploads the coral scan data, the upload is interrupted by Dahl's tech officer. Alex quips, but is interrupted by Dahl.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Is Blocking Upload
ResponseRule.description: After Dahl messages the station, Alex gives Morgan instructions on what to do.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl's Tech Officer Neutralized
ResponseRule.description: Player found the tech officer and neutralized it.

ResponseRule.name: Take Care of Dahl First
ResponseRule.description: Player and Dahl are in arboretum. Player is near Alex's bunker door.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Found Me, Hurry
ResponseRule.description: Alex letting the player know that Dahl is on to him. He's dead soon unless the player acts.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl is In the Arboretum
ResponseRule.description: Alex letting the player know that Dahl is on to him. He's dead soon unless the player acts.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Wakes Up In Bunker
ResponseRule.description: Player Rescued Alex after the Apex arrived by sealing him back into his bunker.

ResponseRule.name: Early Departure
ResponseRule.description: Player got ahold of Alex's Escape Pod Key, And Left the Station Early. Endgame.

ResponseRule.name: Player tries to fabricate a Neuromod
ResponseRule.description: Plays when the player tries to use a Neuromod fabrication plan for the first time and the license has been revoked.

ResponseRule.name: Dahl Neutralized In Arboretum
ResponseRule.description: Player took Dahl out in the Arboretum. Alex feels safe coming out of his bunker now.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path: Plyr Planted the Nullwave
ResponseRule.description: Player stuck the NWD on the heart of the coral.

ResponseRule.name: Nullwave Path: Plyr Fabricated a Nullwave
ResponseRule.description: Player fabricated special end game null wave device.

ResponseRule.name: Station self-destruct Primed. Alex headed to Bridge. January dead.
ResponseRule.description: Player intiated self-destruct. Janaury is dead. No shuttle availabe. Alex is headed to bridge to watch the end.

ResponseRule.name: Solar Flare: Magnetosphere Needs Repair (From Alex)
ResponseRule.description: Alex tells the player to fix the busted Magnetosphere

ResponseRule.name: Solar Flare: Magnetosphere Repair Done (From Alex)
ResponseRule.description: Alex congratz the player on fixing the magnetosphere.

ResponseRule.name: Alex Reacts to Survivors Killed
ResponseRule.description: Player just killed some survivors at the behest of Dahl and has generally been playing like a psychopath.

ResponseRule.name: Alex PA Address to Survivors and Dahl
ResponseRule.description: Alex gets on the PA to warn surviors about Dahl and to order Dahl to stand down.
